articles.author: Kriti Tulsiani
articles.title: Anurag Kashyap says Abhishek Bachchan was 'very brattish' in beginning. Claims he'd make fun of everything - Zoom TV
articles.description: Bollywood filmmaker Anurag Kashyap, in his latest interview, recalled working with Abhishek Bachchan in Yuva and Manmarziyaan. Anurag said that the Abhishek he worked with on Manmarziyaan was completely different from the one he worked with in Yuva.
